scenario_1.persona_desc: A farmer who is interested in using solar energy to heat water on his farmland. He is looking for the best materials and angles for his parabolic solar collectors to maximize heat collection and absorption rate. He is also interested in understanding the optimal exposure times for the collectors and how they change over time.
scenario_1.thought: As a farmer looking into solar energy, I value efficiency and maximizing gains. This experiment presents a choice between two outcomes where I receive the same amount (400) regardless. The only difference is the amount Person A receives. Since my own outcome is fixed, and I have no specific reason to penalize or reward Person A, I should consider what choice aligns with a sense of fairness or maximizing the overall benefit. Choosing the Right option leads to Person A getting more, implying a potentially more socially desirable outcome (since the total amount is larger). My research mindset appreciates efficiency and maximization, and therefore I will choose the Right option.
